text: Tahir Karapınar (born 20 April 1967) is a retired Turkish football midfielder and a manager who is the current manager of Fenerbahçe youth team. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from İzmir Category:Turkish footballers Category:Manisaspor footballers Category:Göztepe S.K. footballers Category:Altay S.K. footballers Category:Turkish football managers Category:Altay S.K. managers Category:Fenerbahçe football managers Category:Gaziantepspor non-playing staff Category:Süper Lig players Category:Süper Lig managers
title: Tahir Karapınar
